Usage example

Assuming that buttons are defined in controller like this:


            ctrl.cardButtons = [
                {label: 'Operation 2', onclick: op2},
                {label: 'Operation 1', onclick: op1, className: 'btn-danger'}
            ];
        

            <lp-card data="mainCtrl.device" title="{{mainCtrl.device.title}}" buttons="mainCtrl.cardButtons">
                <div>{{mainCtrl.device.body}}</div>
            </lp-card>
{{mainCtrl.device.body}}
